title: Set Up a Tax Payment Plan
description: A citizen owes back taxes and wants to set up a monthly payment plan.

tasks.description: Identify the citizen and the total amount of taxes owed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the citizen's tax record and the outstanding balance.

tasks.description: Determine eligibility for a payment plan based on agency criteria.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the citizen is eligible to set up a payment plan.

tasks.description: Establish the monthly payment amount and schedule, and get the citizen's agreement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sets up the installment agreement in the system.
